Html: First off, I do a lot of my own theory crafting.  However Im a very busy person so a quick comparison application is a huge help.  I play a raid healing Disc priest and Im prone to casting bubblesP penances and flash heals.  I already have enough haste to reduce Flash heal to 1 sec.  So why does Rawr show tht some BiS pieces for me have pure haste on them?  What about the crit piece right below it?  Can anybody shed some light on this?

Its hard to know why you are having this issue with the low amount of information you posted.

 

If you want my educated guess: The amount of haste on that piece of gear increases your throughput more than the amount of crit on another piece of gear.
Still completely unhelpful.  It's showing me at 44% haste and I've got it set up that I am mostly a bubble spammer with a few flash heals.  What kind of Disc priest wants that much haste?
Post an issue with your character xml please.
